about_the_game:
Welcome to GateTail!


GateTail is a comedic story-rich turn-based RPG with multiple endings based on your choices! This adventure-strategy game prides itself on numerous surprises, secrets, characters, and 10+ unique endings based the dumb choices you may or may not make! Join ..., (yes that's her real name?) as she explores a whole new dimension known only as GateTail in the search for her lost friend and the TRUE purpose of her existence!

You won't be alone, however, as within this strange land lies swaggy birds, magically powerful humans, dinosaurs, dragons, glitchy trees, and even GateTail's supreme overlord and trustworthy com"pain"ion, Fred the Frog himself! The ONLY thing that makes these threats similar in ANY way is that they ALL want your use and will come to MANY DIFFERENT conclusions on how to get the MOST out of you possible!

Do YOU have what it takes to make it through GateTail's combat, challenges, puzzles, and more in order to FIND your lost friend and UNLOCK your true potential while doing so, learning more about this dimension's RICH history and travesty!?

Well, there's only one way to find out, now is there?



Features:

- 10+ choice-based endings (+Well ending)

- Vastly unique and varied locations (Have you ever walked through the source code of a game before?)

- 200+ enemies (Watch out for Randy.)

- Tons of different minigames & mechanics (There's a fishing one in this game.)

- Diverse & interesting characters (& Jackson.)

- Varied and challenging boss fights (Without relying on RNG!)

- Horror elements (That you can disable.)

- Comedy (Ah yes.)

- Gambling (WE CANT HAVE THIS IN OUR 13+ (simulated gambling) GAME.)





As you can see, GateTail's a VAST and VARIED world ready for YOU! (and you specifically.)

Ribbit, ribbit.

mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: GateTail

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows® 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

short_description: Have you ever been suddenly swept to a new dimension via a Gate? Just find who you're looking for, and it'll all be worth it in the end! Ribbit ribbit.
